items.sentence: Why don't you stay in Boston for another week or so?
I opened the car door and pulled Tom out of the car.
I'm glad that we didn't try to do that by ourselves.
Was Tom the one who told you what needed to be done?
What's the best way to get to Tom's place from here?
What's the best way to get to Tom's house from here?
It was difficult to persuade Tom to change his mind.
It seems that Tom is aware that Mary didn't do that.
There was no point in arguing with Tom at that time.
Are you absolutely sure that that's going to happen?
